title: Evelyn has no role
body: Put eve back in the game, she fits nowhere in the game

replies.body: This is good there is ZERO counter play to evelynn's stealth you can't see her coming in and she forces the lanes to play passive until 6 if you drop a pink ward your lane opponent or eve just clears it and she can come back in 30 secs and you would be none the wiser

I think it's conflicting how she's both AD and AP. She is a true hybrid, unlike champs like Jax which can use AP to an extent. Hybrids don't really have many item choices that cover both areas apart from the two obvious ones being Gunblade and Trinity Force.

AD or AP off tank in the jungle, AP of AD mid, top, you just have to know that you have a less chance of victory (she is too squishy) so make your runes and masteries make her stronger not that hard she does fit just in a rare team

evelynn is still an ok jungler, I agree buffs are needed, but since pink wards are near useless atm (against stealth champs) she can gank really well, and an early {{item:3047}} will help with taking too much damage when jungle or ganking. it would be really cool if eve got full stealth like teemo when not moving. but as a hybrid damage dealer her damage is quite alot after {{item:3078}}  and {{item:3153}} .
Fix eve by making her E magical damage again, so she can be played mid and can go full assassin, if falls behind, glhf if ahead ggwp enemy Surrender@10

Or Change her E 
Widows touch

Basically heals evelynn and does a littles less damage then the current eve on live servers, makes her be able to jungle

Also remove her passive and change it to something different, Then make her W 
Gives her move speed like in live then after 3 secodns stealths her until she is attacked or cast spells, W still resets so her passive can heal her instead.
Basically giving her free health regen or free spell vamp or maybe attacking the same target drains more health (up to 3 stacks)
